A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The worst films I've ever seen. When you write trilogy you should tie in the stories. This was the Star War to end all the Star Wars and this trilogy is dead. There's nothing to hope for from this garbage of movie. It single handedly ruins the whole saga and brings the original main heroes just to die for nothing. I wish I'd never seen this movie. Filled with cheap trademark marvel/disney jokes...
